<small>Hebrew form: **<big>[[H0639|אַף]]</big>**</small>
 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אֲנַף‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אַף‎</span> [[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>§ 55, 4</sup>] **noun masculine** only dual ([[BDB#Schulth|Schulth]]<sup>ZAW xxii (1902), 164</sup>) ==face== (Biblical Hebrew <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אַף‎</span>, √ <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אנף‎</span>; Aramaic of Têma <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אנפי‎</span> [[BDB#Cook|SAC]]<sup>23</sup> [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>222</sup> [[BDB#Cooke|Cooke]]<sup>69, 1. 14</sup>, so [[BDB#S-C|S-C]]<sup>G 19 and</sup> (usually) <lookup onclick="bdbabb('Tg')"><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ᵑ7‎</span><sup>**J**</sup></lookup>; <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אפין‎</span> <lookup onclick="bdbabb('Tg')"><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ᵑ7‎</span><sup>**Onk Jon**</sup></lookup>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Syriac, Christian-Palestinian Aramaic ([[BDB#Schulth|Schulth]]<sup>Lex.13</sup>); also <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אפי‎</span> Palmyrene [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>222</sup> [[BDB#Cooke|Cooke]]<sup>p.339, Christian-Palestinian</sup> Aramaic with preposition <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Schulth|Schulth]]<sup>Lex.14, etc</sup>.); — plural suffix 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אַנְפּוֺהִי‎</span> [[Dan.2.46|Dan 2:46]]; [[Dan.3.19|Dan 3:19]].
